item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesnâ€™t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "A word to the wise ain't necessary, it's the stupid ones who need advice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Gena Showalter
item.description: "What makes big boobs and perkiness so attractive to boys? I mean, really. Two round, mounds of fat and a fake smile. Yeah, winning attributes." -- Gena Showalter

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Donâ€™t put your wand there, boy! ... Better wizards than you have lost buttocks, you know!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Will Rogers
item.description: "Never miss a good chance to shut up." -- Will Rogers

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Louis L'Amour
item.description: "Victory is won not in miles but in inches. Win a little now, hold your ground, and later, win a little more." -- Louis L'Amour

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Louis L'Amour
item.description: "Love is a moment of stillness that sometimes a word can shatter to pieces. Or love can be a thing that endures, a rich, deep current flowing unending through the years." -- Louis L'Amour

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Louis L'Amour
item.description: "Today is all we have, tomorrow is a mirage that may never become reality." -- Louis L'Amour

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Louis L'Amour
item.description: "Often I hear people say they do not have time to read. That's absolute nonsense. If one really wants to learn, one has to decide what is important. Spending an evening on the town? Attending a ball game? Or learning something that can be with you your life long." -- Louis L'Amour

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Kate Chopin
item.description: "She wanted something to happen - something, anything: she did not know what." -- Kate Chopin

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by William Nicholson
item.description: "We read to know we're not alone." -- William Nicholson

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Bobbi add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy
